description: This file sets up and interacts with an AI agent, utilizing the 'Agent' class and 'OpenAIChat' model, to generate and retrieve chat messages, including a horror story and follow-up questions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of generating responses and maintaining conversation history.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and streams the response.

methods.name: get_messages_for_session
methods.description: Retrieves the list of messages in the current conversation session.
